targets.rawSql: SELECT count(*) FROM alerts WHERE acknowledged = false AND severity = 'critical' AND created_at > now() - interval '1 hour'
SELECT count(*) FROM alerts WHERE acknowledged = false AND severity = 'warning' AND created_at > now() - interval '1 hour'
SELECT count(DISTINCT machine_id) FROM metrics WHERE metric_name = 'operating_state' AND value = 3 AND time > now() - interval '1 minute'
SELECT avg(value) FROM metrics WHERE metric_name = 'bearing_wear' AND time > now() - interval '1 minute'
SELECT avg(value) FROM metrics WHERE metric_name = 'seal_condition' AND time > now() - interval '1 minute'
SELECT count(DISTINCT machine_id) FROM metrics WHERE metric_name = 'failure_mode' AND value > 0 AND time > now() - interval '5 minutes'
SELECT count(DISTINCT machine_id) FROM machines WHERE status = 'active'
SELECT count(DISTINCT location) FROM machines

panels.title: STATUS BY LOCATION - Your Areas of Responsibility

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  m.location as "Location",
  COUNT(m.id) as "Total Pumps",
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN os.value = 3 THEN m.id END) as "Running",
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN os.value = 0 THEN m.id END) as "Stopped",
  ROUND(AVG(bw.value)::numeric, 1) as "Avg Bearing Wear %",
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN bw.value > 50 THEN m.id END) as "High Bearing",
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN a.severity = 'critical' AND a.acknowledged = false THEN m.id END) as "Critical Alerts",
  COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN a.severity = 'warning' AND a.acknowledged = false THEN m.id END) as "Warnings"
FROM machines m
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (SELECT value FROM metrics WHERE machine_id = m.id AND metric_name = 'operating_state' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) os ON true
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (SELECT value FROM metrics WHERE machine_id = m.id AND metric_name = 'bearing_wear' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) bw ON true
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (SELECT severity, acknowledged FROM alerts WHERE machine_id = m.id AND acknowledged = false ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1) a ON true
WHERE m.status = 'active'
GROUP BY m.location
ORDER BY "Critical Alerts" DESC, "High Bearing" DESC

panels.title: Location Summary - Click Location to Filter

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  m.name as "Pump",
  m.location as "Location",
  m.type as "Type",
  CASE 
    WHEN os.value IS NULL THEN 'Unknown'
    WHEN os.value = 0 THEN 'Stopped'
    WHEN os.value = 1 THEN 'Stopping'
    WHEN os.value = 2 THEN 'Starting'
    WHEN os.value = 3 THEN 'Running'
  END as "Status",
  ROUND(bw.value::numeric, 1) as "bearing_wear",
  ROUND(sc.value::numeric, 1) as "seal_condition",
  ROUND(mh.value::numeric, 1) as "motor_health",
  ROUND(temp.value::numeric, 1) as "temperature",
  ROUND(vib.value::numeric, 1) as "vibration",
  ROUND(press.value::numeric, 1) as "pressure",
  ROUND(rpm.value::numeric, 0) as "rpm",
  ROUND(rt.value::numeric, 1) as "running_hours"
FROM machines m
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT value FROM metrics 
  WHERE machine_id = m.id AND metric_name = 'operating_state' 
  ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
) os ON true
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT value FROM metrics 
  WHERE machine_id = m.id AND metric_name = 'bearing_wear' 
  ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
) bw ON true
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT value FROM metrics 
  WHERE machine_id = m.id AND metric_name = 'seal_condition' 
  ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
) sc ON true
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT value FROM metrics 
  WHERE machine_id = m.id AND metric_name = 'motor_health' 
  ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
) mh ON true
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT value FROM metrics 
  WHERE machine_id = m.id AND metric_name = 'temperature' 
  ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
) temp ON true
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT value FROM metrics 
  WHERE machine_id = m.id AND metric_name = 'vibration' 
  ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
) vib ON true
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT value FROM metrics 
  WHERE machine_id = m.id AND metric_name = 'pressure' 
  ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
) press ON true
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT value FROM metrics 
  WHERE machine_id = m.id AND metric_name = 'rpm' 
  ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
) rpm ON true
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
  SELECT value FROM metrics 
  WHERE machine_id = m.id AND metric_name = 'running_time' 
  ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
) rt ON true
WHERE m.status = 'active'
ORDER BY bw.value DESC NULLS LAST

panels.title: All Pumps - Health Overview (Sorted by Bearing Wear)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  a.created_at as "Time",
  m.name as "Pump",
  m.location as "Location",
  a.severity as "Severity",
  a.message as "Message",
  CASE WHEN a.acknowledged THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END as "Acknowledged",
  COALESCE(a.acknowledged_by, '') as "By"
FROM alerts a
JOIN machines m ON m.id = a.machine_id
WHERE a.acknowledged = false
ORDER BY 
  CASE a.severity WHEN 'critical' THEN 1 WHEN 'warning' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END,
  a.created_at DESC
LIMIT 25

SELECT 
  m.name as "Pump",
  m.location as "Location",
  ROUND(MAX(mt.value)::numeric, 1) as "Bearing Wear %"
FROM metrics mt
JOIN machines m ON m.id = mt.machine_id
WHERE mt.metric_name = 'bearing_wear' AND mt.time > now() - interval '5 minutes'
GROUP BY m.name, m.location
HAVING MAX(mt.value) > 50
ORDER BY MAX(mt.value) DESC

SELECT 
  m.name as "Pump",
  m.location as "Location",
  ROUND(MAX(mt.value)::numeric, 1) as "Seal Condition %"
FROM metrics mt
JOIN machines m ON m.id = mt.machine_id
WHERE mt.metric_name = 'seal_condition' AND mt.time > now() - interval '5 minutes'
GROUP BY m.name, m.location
HAVING MAX(mt.value) < 60
ORDER BY MAX(mt.value) ASC

SELECT 
  m.name as "Pump",
  m.location as "Location",
  MAX(mt.value) as "Failure Mode"
FROM metrics mt
JOIN machines m ON m.id = mt.machine_id
WHERE mt.metric_name = 'failure_mode' AND mt.value > 0 AND mt.time > now() - interval '10 minutes'
GROUP BY m.name, m.location
ORDER BY MAX(mt.time) DESC

panels.title: PUMP DETAIL - Select Pump from Dropdown Above

targets.rawSql:
SELECT value FROM metrics 
WHERE metric_name = 'temperature' AND machine_id = '$machine' 
ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT value FROM metrics 
WHERE metric_name = 'vibration' AND machine_id = '$machine' 
ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT value FROM metrics 
WHERE metric_name = 'pressure' AND machine_id = '$machine' 
ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT value FROM metrics 
WHERE metric_name = 'rpm' AND machine_id = '$machine' 
ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT value FROM metrics 
WHERE metric_name = 'bearing_wear' AND machine_id = '$machine' 
ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT value FROM metrics 
WHERE metric_name = 'seal_condition' AND machine_id = '$machine' 
ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT
  time_bucket('30 seconds', time) AS time,
  avg(value) AS value
FROM metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND metric_name = 'temperature'
  AND machine_id = '$machine'
GROUP BY time_bucket('30 seconds', time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time_bucket('30 seconds', time) AS time,
  avg(value) AS value
FROM metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND metric_name = 'vibration'
  AND machine_id = '$machine'
GROUP BY time_bucket('30 seconds', time)
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time_bucket('1 minute', time) AS time,
  avg(value) AS value
FROM metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND metric_name IN ('bearing_wear', 'seal_condition', 'motor_health')
  AND machine_id = '$machine'
GROUP BY time_bucket('1 minute', time), metric_name
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  time_bucket('30 seconds', time) AS time,
  avg(value) AS value
FROM metrics
WHERE $__timeFilter(time)
  AND metric_name = 'pressure'
  AND machine_id = '$machine'
GROUP BY time_bucket('30 seconds', time)
ORDER BY time

query.query: SELECT id::text FROM machines ORDER BY name
